title: RR campus (Aiml or electronics and communications)
content: If I have option to change my branch from electronics and communication to Aiml is that good option or continuing in electronics is good .since Aiml is a new branch in Pes how would the placements be ,better than electronics pls can anyone suggest!

comments.body:
Obviously not as good as cs but it's definitely better than electronics, for placements and since you're also not interested in elec

But my recommendation is to branch change to cs in ec campus
